mods.abstract: Christian Brothers College presidents Brothers Hyacinth Richard Gerlach, I. Francis McEvoy, Leopold Julian Dodd, Lambert Thomas Matthews, and Terence McLaughlin gathered for the fund rally of the general gifts phase in the Development Drive for a "Greater CBC."
mods.accessCondition: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law.
